TABLE.NAME: scavengerhunt
TABLE.COMMENT: This table saves information about an instance of mod_scavengerhunt in a course.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: Course scavengerhunt activity belongs to

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: name field for moodle instances

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: General introduction of the scavengerhunt activity

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: Format of the intro field (MOODLE, HTML, MARKDOWN...)

FIELD.NAME: alwaysshowdescription
FIELD.COMMENT: If false the assignment intro will only be displayed after the allowsubmissionsfrom date. If true it will always be displayed.

FIELD.NAME: duedate
FIELD.COMMENT: The due date for the scavengerhunt. Displayed to students.

FIELD.NAME: allowsubmissionsfromdate
FIELD.COMMENT: If set, submissions will only be accepted after this date.

FIELD.NAME: cutoffdate
FIELD.COMMENT: The final date after which submissions will no longer be accepted for this scavengerhunt without an extensions.

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The maximum grade. Can be negative to indicate the use of a scale.

TABLE.NAME: scavengerhunt_roads
TABLE.COMMENT: This table saves information about a road of mod_scavengerhunt in a course.

FIELD.NAME: scavengerhunt_id
FIELD.COMMENT: Identying the activity created

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: name field for moodle instances

FIELD.NAME: group_id
FIELD.COMMENT: Identifies the group can play this road

FIELD.NAME: grouping_id
FIELD.COMMENT: Identifies the grouping can play this road

FIELD.NAME: validated
FIELD.COMMENT: If true the road has been validated to play

TABLE.NAME: scavengerhunt_riddles
TABLE.COMMENT: This table saves information about each riddle of every road in a course.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: name field for each riddle

FIELD.NAME: road_id
FIELD.COMMENT: Identifying the road created

FIELD.NAME: num_riddle
FIELD.COMMENT: Order of the riddles in every road. Every road starts with riddle = 1

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: General description of the riddle

TABLE.NAME: scavengerhunt_attempts
TABLE.COMMENT: This table saves information on each attempt by a user to solve a riddle.

FIELD.NAME: road_id
FIELD.COMMENT: Identifying the road created

FIELD.NAME: riddle_id
FIELD.COMMENT: Identifies the riddle that the user is trying to solve

FIELD.NAME: accum_time
FIELD.COMMENT: Accumulated time since an user starting the road

FIELD.NAME: accum_distance
FIELD.COMMENT: Accumulated distance since an user starting the road

FIELD.NAME: user_id
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id

FIELD.NAME: group_id
FIELD.COMMENT: The group id for team submissions

FIELD.NAME: success
FIELD.COMMENT: If true the riddle has been completed

FIELD.NAME: scavengerhunt_id
FIELD.COMMENT: Locked page

FIELD.NAME: user_id
FIELD.COMMENT: Identifiying user
